title: Workshop on Utilizing Classroom-Based Action Research Workbooks for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational research methodologies and understanding of the ADDIE model
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course conducted in mobile learning environments using digital devices, designed to systematically develop pre-service teachers' action research competencies for solving classroom problems

learning_goals: Enhance classroom problem analysis and research design capabilities using structured workbooks aligned with the ADDIE model phases
Apply data collection and analysis techniques in authentic mathematics classroom contexts to make educational decisions
Strengthen self-reflection skills in the educational research process through peer feedback and iterative improvements
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
